Plot: After two of the devil's three sons escape Hell to wreak havoc on Earth, the devil must send his third son, the mild-mannered Nicky, to bring them back before it's too late.
Title: Little Nicky
Writer: Tim Herlihy, Adam Sandler, Steven Brill
Actors: Adam Sandler, Patricia Arquette, Harvey Keitel, Rhys Ifans
tomatoConsensus: Despite the presence of a large, talented cast, the jokes in Little Nicky are dumb, tasteless, and not that funny, and Adam Sandler's character is grating to watch.
